title: SBSI
text:
We are proud to be an official  Student Organization!




Welcome to the official website of the Santa Barbara Statistics Initiative (SBSI)! We are currently in the process of becoming an officially registered chapter of the American Statistical Association, and were founded in 2023 at the University of California, Santa Barbara (UCSB).


Our primary goal is to function as an umbrella organization for several preexisting Statistics and Data Science programs in existence at UCSB, providing support wherever necessary. Currently, we collaborate with the following organizations:




PSTAT Grad Committee


  


The PSTAT Graduate Student Committee is the officially-recognized student association of graduate students in the Department of Statistics and Applied Probability (PSTAT) at UCSB.

title: Officers
text:
Please Note: This is a list of members directly affiliated with the SBSI. Our subsidiary organizations may have other members not listed here; for further details, please consult the respective sites for our subsidiary organizations (listed on this site’s home page).
To become a member directly affiliated with the SBSI, please utilize our contact page.

title: About
text:
Founded in 2023, the Santa Barbara Statistics Initiative (SBSI) aims to foster a greater involvement between Santa Barbara-area students (both undergraduate and graduate) and the fields of Statistics and Data Science.
Cognizant of the myriad of on-campus student organizations, the founders of SBSI opted to not simply overwrite the hard work of these organizations; rather, SBSI was designed as a sort of “umbrella” or “envelope” to encompass these already-existing organizations.
The main goals of SBSI are:

to provide support (financially, physically, and emotionally) to already-existing Statistics-related student organizations
to facilitate and host a variety of events throughout the academic year
to encourage greater interaction with Statistics and Data Science by all Santa Barbara-area students
